tool_input.command:
if [ -n "$GITHUB_PAT" ]; then export GH_TOKEN="$GITHUB_PAT"; fi && gh pr create --title "feat: #6 - Add selectable color palettes (themes) for the game UI" --body "$(cat <<'EOF'
## Summary

This PR adds selectable color palette themes to the 2048 game UI, allowing users to choose between Classic, Dark, High Contrast, and Ocean themes. The implementation changes only colors without affecting gameplay, layout, or animations.

## Implementation Plan

See [implementation plan](../specs/issue-6-adw-86b194ea-sdlc_planner-add-color-palette-themes.md) for detailed specifications.

## Changes

### Planning Phase Completed
- ✅ Generated implementation specification
- ✅ Defined four color palettes (Classic, Dark, High Contrast, Ocean)
- ✅ Created detailed component structure and architecture
- ✅ Documented color palette definitions and acceptance criteria

### Key Files Added
- `specs/issue-6-adw-86b194ea-sdlc_planner-add-color-palette-themes.md` - Complete implementation plan
- ADW agent logs and state tracking files

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Palette selector available in UI with all four themes
- [ ] Switching palettes updates only colors (no layout/animation changes)
- [ ] Selected palette applies immediately and consistently
- [ ] All palettes maintain readable text contrast
- [ ] (Optional) Chosen palette persists after refresh

## ADW Tracking
- **ADW ID**: 86b194ea
- **Issue Type**: feature
- **Status**: Planning phase complete, ready for implementation

Closes #6
EOF
)" --base main
tool_input.description: Create pull request with GH CLI
